example.parse: (CONJ و) (SBAR-NOM-TPC-2 (WHNP-1 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (PV+PVSUFF_SUBJ:3MS أصاب) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN_PROP بوش))))) (NP-SBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_NOM سبب) (NP (NP (POSS_PRON_3MS ه)) (NP (-NONE- *T*-2)))) (S-NOM-PRD (VP (NOUN.VN+CASE_DEF_NOM إرسال) (NP-SBJ (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN الجسم)) (NP-OBJ (NP (NOUN+NSUFF_FEM_SG+CASE_INDEF_ACC إشارة)) (PP (PREP إلى) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN القلب)))) (NP-ADV (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC عبر) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN العصب) (DET+ADJ+CASE_DEF_GEN الرئوي)))
